front.title: •Taking Them With Us
front.gametext: Each player, if that player has a capital starship armed with a starship weapon in battle, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise and once per battle, may reduce the defense value of one opponent's capital starship present by 4 for remainder of the battle. At sites related to systems you occupy, your non-pilot warriors are deploy - 1, defense value +2 and forfeit +1.
